title: permabanned after 6 years
body:
i play this since 2012
The amount of afks is never reduced but it always seems to be im the only one punished for being upset about it
got 2 weeks ban, played again and got honor level 1 
then got now permabanned for this:

Game 1
Database Error: how u do this
Database Error: xD
Database Error: already
Database Error: why we couldnt remake?
Database Error: i think im playing bots?
Database Error: nothing new
Database Error: just played a game with afk
Database Error: and now again
Database Error: np
Database Error: hi velkoz
Database Error: game is over
Database Error: i have 27 stacks
Database Error: idc anymore
Database Error: ok
Database Error: yeh
Database Error: its ok will ge tmore chances
Database Error: where there are less retards
Database Error: the polish afk wants to report me hehe
Database Error: adorable
Database Error: im just gonna mute ye
Database Error: im done
Database Error: u need drake to win this?
Database Error: jesus
Database Error: ur so cute
Database Error: as cute as velkoz

I know im toxic!! and i try so hard to contain it.. smashing my table instead .. well shit, it broke
just when you use LoL to escape your horrendous reality, this happens on top XD 
idk what to say, but there's a god, he really hates me !!

Same just happened to me. Dude, im at a loss for words. Riot is driving away players. And stealing money. People have sunk hundreds even thousands of dollars into the game, to just get backlash reported by actually toxic players and then permabanned. Its nuts.

i've said horrendous things too.. my life is a complete mega mess .. playing a stressful game like this doesn't help much when ppl afking and blaming and flaming.. i felt i suppress myself even further playing this.. so i quit for almost a year in 2016 !!  i obviously love the game but i guess i cant deal with flamers/afks.. guess this game isnt for me eh?

edit: idc about the money, money comes and goes

They just have a very flawed justice system and are too prideful on fixing it. Instead they issue more bans and tell people to deal with it. I miss older games when you could just settle things and move on in chat like in World of Warcraft, Everquest, practically any other god damn game. But Riot is a newer company and have a ton of younger devs and management mostly who were born out of the snowflake era. 

What can we really expect? They lost my business and they have no idea how to properly run a game.

i wouldn't say they don't know, but definitely less and less enjoyable due to the toxic players and afks, its just crazy what happens in game i just feel so pushed over the edge and me having a shitty life i just go for it too..

when i complained about a 2 weeks ban in 2016 they said: "u cant fix flaming by flaming" well wtf should i do then? might as well bend over.. i barely play enjoyable games with optimistic soulful players, and when i might blame someone and they stay positive i just go back and say how cool they are and the game just blossoms with both of us doing well. but whne i try it with others i always actually get the one reported either way xD
